Hotel and restaurant group Whitbread has asked landlords for a 50% rent cut for the next three months as pandemic restrictions continue to hit trading.

articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: Welsh brewer Brains hands pubs to Marston's, saving 1,300 jobs - The Guardian
articles.description: Company has come under financial pressure during Covid pandemic after pub closures
articles.content:
Family-owned Welsh brewer SA Brain & Co has handed over the running of its 156 pubs to Marstons, saving 1,300 jobs, after the coronavirus pandemic threatened their closure.
